column3: â€œI am typically a sativa\sativa dom hybrid user due to issues with depression, but WOW is this Martian Candy a great way to shake things up. Very relaxing chill strain, good for putting a smile on a depressed face.â€

â€œWhen I try a strain, I'm looking for relief of fibro symptoms. This is one of the best I've tried for it. A single puff or two during the daytime leaves me pretty functional with this fantastic lightness in my limbs and far less pain. Great relief from pain and fatigue. I find it easier to move, and this generally chills out my nervous system and leaves me with only a slightly fuzzy brain and a great mood.

The unusu...â€

â€œGOOD LORD DUDE. World peace would happen if everyone smoked this strain. Happiness is just a whole new thing. Driving is so beautiful on the open country roads. You can focus. Pain is GONE. But I'm able to cook dinner and bop to Steve Earle and Alabama.

â€œMy favorite strain so far! Great taste and amazing body high. Plus I feel super happy. Couldn't ask for more!â€

â€œVery mellow. This is my new go-to strain for overwhelming in-law events. Relaxed me enough to deal with the 25+ people events, without any of them having a clue that I was high the entire day. 1 nice big hit every 60-90 minutes was great.

Used in PAX 3 vape. It had a nice taste to it. Earthy with a touch of sweet.

â€œwow this strain was actually amazing. had been a while since I had such a nice Hybrid. it's quite a specific high every single time. hits in the mouth and teeth first... then it goes up to your forehead and you feel a slight oreakssure and eyesight starts going. followed by it going down to your chest. and that's when it starts hitting you like an Edible. then it extends out to your arms and they feel numb and heavy....â€

â€œCool name, but that's about it. Copped a g of martian candy og shatter. Very unique smell and taste. Reminds me of eucalyptus. The high is just too mellow and weak for my taste. I felt focused and quite mellow but like I said the high is on the underwhelming side. No dry eyes or dry mouth tho.
Potency is meh. I don't consider my tolerance to be heavyweight at all. Good strain for beginnersâ€
